faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Quick answers to common questions about our platform.
faq.answers.safety: Yes, NepFund is completely safe and secure. We use industry-standard encryption to protect all transactions and personal information. All campaigns go through a verification process before being published, and we work with trusted payment partners to ensure your donations are processed securely.
faq.answers.fees: NepFund charges a small platform fee to cover payment processing and operational costs. The exact fee structure is transparent and clearly displayed when you create a campaign or make a donation. Most of your contribution goes directly to the cause you're supporting.
faq.answers.anonymous: Yes, you can choose to donate anonymously when making a contribution. Your donation will still be counted towards the campaign goal, but your name and details will not be publicly displayed. The campaign organizer will still receive a notification of your support.
faq.questions.withdraw: How fast can I withdraw funds?
faq.answers.withdraw: Fund withdrawal typically takes 2-5 business days after your withdrawal request is approved. We verify all withdrawal requests to ensure funds are being transferred to verified bank accounts or authorized institutions. You can request withdrawals directly from your campaign dashboard once you've raised funds.
about.hero.title: Empowering Nepal, One Contribution at a Time
about.hero.subtitle: Bridging the gap between kindness and need through transparent, secure crowdfunding
about.origin.title: Our Story
about.origin.story1: NepFund was born from a simple observation: while Nepalis are incredibly generous and community-minded, there was no centralized, transparent platform to connect donors with genuine causes across the country.
about.origin.story2: We saw medical emergencies go unfunded, brilliant startup ideas die without capital, and community projects stall due to lack of resources. We realized that technology could bridge this gap‚Äîmaking it easier for people to help others while ensuring trust and transparency.
about.origin.story3: Today, NepFund is more than a platform‚Äîit's a movement dedicated to ensuring that no genuine need goes unmet due to lack of funds. We believe in the power of collective action and the spirit of giving that defines Nepal.
about.mission.title: Our Mission
about.mission.description: To democratize fundraising in Nepal by providing a secure, transparent, and easy-to-use platform for medical emergencies, social causes, and creative projects. We empower individuals and communities to make a real difference.
about.vision.title: Our Vision
about.vision.description: A Nepal where no genuine need goes unmet due to lack of funds. We envision a future where technology enables seamless giving, where every contribution counts, and where communities thrive through mutual support.
about.trust.title: The NepFund Promise
about.trust.subtitle: Trust and transparency are at the heart of everything we do. Here's how we protect you and your contributions.
about.promises.verified.title: Verified Campaigns
about.promises.verified.description: Every campaign goes through a rigorous verification process. We manually verify KYC documents and supporting materials to ensure authenticity before approval.
about.promises.secure.title: Secure Payments
about.promises.secure.description: We integrate with trusted payment partners including eSewa, Khalti, ConnectIPS, and Stripe. All transactions are encrypted and processed securely.
about.promises.transparent.title: Clear Fee Structure
about.promises.transparent.description: We maintain complete transparency about our fees. A small platform fee covers payment processing and operational costs‚Äîthe rest goes directly to the cause.
about.impact.title: Our Impact
about.impact.subtitle: Together, we're making a real difference in communities across Nepal

about.differentiators.direct.description: Funds go directly to verified bank accounts or authorized institutions. No intermediaries‚Äîyour donation reaches where it's needed most.
